title: Adviser on debt management appointed - Business - DAWN.COM
content:
ISLAMABAD: The Ministry of Finance has appointed Omer M. Khan as adviser on debt management on a pro bono basis, with immediate effect.

Mr Khan has previously worked for International Investment Bank Limited, at the Bahamas, Deutsche Bank AG, Singapore, Cross Border & Treasury Solutions, Barclays Capital, Credit Suisse First Bostan, and Muslim Commercial Bank.

Published in Dawn, April 19th, 2025
